p: This plant extract has been employed in human spermatozoa [ 54] by adding it to the freezing and thawing medium. The range of concentrations used was from 5 to 30 µg/mL. The addition of this plant to the semen extender significantly increased sperm progressive motility, normal morphology, and viability together with a reduction in DNA damage. However, some of the concentrations employed had deleterious effects on sperm parameters. The best results were obtained with a concentration of 10 and 20 µg/mL.
